sentence.Network_en: If you make it an excommunication matter, I have nothing more to say, of course.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你动不动就开除教籍什么的, 我当然就不再说什么了.

sentence.Network_en: Excommunication from the church, therefore, was not the final penalty.
sentence.Network_cn: 故此, 被开除出教会, 并不是最后的惩罚.

sentence.Network_en: Excommunication – Spirit putting men to death.
sentence.Network_cn: 开除会藉﹕圣灵甚至治死人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...诅，关键不是这两个中文词的字面意思，因为天主教的“绝罚”（也称excommunication）不仅仅是一种“停止圣餐”或“开除教籍”的宗教 …
游戏周边资料：西洋神秘学  -... ... Evolution 进化，演化，演变。 Excommunication 被逐出教会，被开除会籍，被逐出山门。.
卡美洛的阴影_百度百科 ... 教会干涉 Church influence 革除教籍（excommunication） Excommunication 赦罪 Indulgence.
...期的迷信的心理,对鬼神的恐惧," 牺牲"的残酷,"破门"(excommunication)的苦痛,家法的压迫,都足以构成神法和善良风俗的有力的制裁.

list.abs: 29 。 On thesentence of excommunication对句禁教Introduction导言
Vto excommunicate 开除教藉; 逐出教会New
The man excommunicated from the Christian Church ., 那人被驱逐出基督教会.
If you make it an excommunication matter , I have nothing more to say , of course ., 如果你动不动就开除教籍什么的 , 我当然就不再说什么了.

entry.tran: （天主教或东正教）将…逐出教会，开除…的教籍
entry.def: If a Roman Catholic or member of the Orthodox Church is excommunicated, it is publicly and officially stated that the person is no longer allowed to be a member of the Church. This is a punishment for some very great wrong that they have done.

example.ex: Eventually, he was excommunicated along with his mentor...
example.tran: 最后，他和他的导师一起被开除教籍。

example.ex: In 1766 he excommunicated the village for its 'depraved diversion.'
example.tran: 1766年，他以“堕落地享乐”为由将那个村庄逐出教会。

means.word_mean: 2. the act of banishing a member of the Church from the communion of believers and the privileges of the Church; cutting a person off from a religious society
